Getting started
===============

Installing
----------

To install ozone, follow these two steps:

1. Download the ozone source code using one of these two options:

  - Go to `GitHub <https://github.com/hwangjt/ozone>`_,
    download the repository and unzip in any directory.
  - In terminal, navigate to the directory in which you want to download the source code
    and use the command :code:`git clone https://github.com/hwangjt/ozone.git` to download.

2. Go into the ozone directory and use the command :code:`pip install -e .` to install ozone.

If you want to uninstall ozone, use the command :code:`pip uninstall ozone`.
